text: Catherine Jane Prichard (4 July 1842 – 29 March 1909), was a Welsh poet and suffragette who was also known by her pen name Buddug. She was the sister of the poet John Robert Pryse. She contributed extensively to the magazine Udgorn Cymru, and advocated for the temperance movement in Wales. == References == Category:1842 births Category:1909 deaths Category:19th-century Welsh poets Category:Welsh suffragists
title: Catherine Prichard
